doc.field: Typescripts: Speech given by Sister Benedicta, OSH (daughter of Ramon Sender) for 46th Anniversary of ALB; "Homage to the Lincoln Battalion," Casa de España, New York, NY, 50th Anniversary of ALB, Nov 8 1986; "Address to the 50th Anniversary Dinner of the ALB," speech given by John L. Hess, Apr 5, 1987 Letters: translations of letters to VALB from: A. Osipenko, Spanish Group of Soviet Veterans (1984); Boris Smirnov, Chairman of the Section of the Participants of Spanish Anti-fascist [sic] (1975) House Resolution (Hawaii) honoring ALB on 50th anniversary of founding (1987); notes to JB from Moe Fishman, 1984 and Miguel Gascon, 1989 Articles: George Seldes, <title render="italic">"Franco's Sixth Column ," The Fight,1938; New York Times Magazine, "The Fight for Peace and Democracy," Apr 1938 Clippings and publicity material re: "The Good Fight"; Guernica; Spanish Civil War 50th Anniversary Pamphlet: ¡No Pasaran!: The 50th Anniversary of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade
